summary.overall_assessment: GOOD - Article demonstrates strong Experience and Expertise through comprehensive coverage, practical examples, and technical accuracy. Authoritativeness and Trustworthiness are acceptable but lag due to missing credibility signals (author credentials, publication date, social proof).
summary.publication_recommendation: APPROVED_WITH_IMPROVEMENTS - Article meets E-E-A-T threshold (7.2/10 > 6.5) and is publication-ready. However, implementing high-priority recommendations (author byline, publication date, testimonials) could boost score to 8.0+ and significantly improve competitive positioning.
